content:
That sounds like a lovely evening! I'd be happy to help you find a new TV show to enjoy with your roommates.

Before I can make some recommendations, could you please tell me a bit more about what you enjoyed about the show you watched last night? Was it:

1. A specific genre (e.g., drama, comedy, sci-fi, horror)?
2. A particular tone (e.g., light-hearted, serious, suspenseful)?
3. A show with complex characters or plotlines?
4. A show with a similar setting or premise to the one you watched last night?
5. Something you'd like to binge-watch or follow week-to-week?

Any additional details you can provide will help me give you more targeted recommendations!
